snippet: Mark Schwartz is well known at Goldman, which he joined in 1979 as a banker. He was a partner by the time the company went public in 1999, and he left a few years later.
abstract: Mark Schwartz is well known at Goldman, which he joined in 1979 as a banker. He was a partner by the time the company went public in 1999, and he left a few years later.

headline.main: Goldman Brings Back a Former Partner
